localhost.controllers

Class ConnectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • localhost.controllers.BaseController
      • localhost.controllers.ConnectionController

  • public final class ConnectionController
extends BaseController
    This class lists all the endpoints of the groups.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public ConnectionResponse getConnection(String id)
                                 throws ApiException,
                                        IOException
        To get the details of a specific connection use this endpoint. Permission: Requires datamanagement privilege.
        Parameters:
        id - Required parameter: The GUID of the connection to query
        Returns:
        Returns the ConnectionResponse response from the API call
        Throws:
        ApiException - Represents error response from the server.
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.

      • getConnectionDatabase

        public List<String> getConnectionDatabase(String id)
                                   throws ApiException,
                                          IOException
        To get the list of databases for a connection, use this endpoint. The response will include databases from the data platform corresponding to the connection id provided. Permission: Requires datamanagement privilege.
        Parameters:
        id - Required parameter: The GUID of the connection
        Returns:
        Returns the List of String response from the API call
        Throws:
        ApiException - Represents error response from the server.
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
